document.title: Photos
document.abstract: A collection of photos from the first fifty years of the ILR School.
document.publication-title: The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni and Friends

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation
Gruenfeld Goldberg, E. (Ed). McKersie, R., Miller, J. Gormly, Aronson, R., & Julian, R. (Compilers). (1986). The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni & Friends. Ithaca, NY: Cornell University. http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/ilratfifty/23/
